full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR BLA MA MGON PO 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS LA BRTEN PA'I 'PHO BA NYAMS SU LEN 'DOD PA'I GANG ZAG GIS YID DANG MTHUN PA'I GNAS SU MCHOD GTOR DANG SKU 'DRA BRIS 'BUD GANG RIGS BZHUGS SU GSOL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI DKA' BCU RGYAL MTSAN BDE LEGS DANG RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG DON GRUB GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR RDO RJE 'DZIN PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
